title: [Person of Interest Fanvid]John Reese's Big Gun Show_It's My Life
author: 李丹
comment: This is a SUPERB video of all that we LOVE about John Reese & Person of Interest.  Jim Caviezel does an amazing job of handling a large variety of guns convincingly.  Thank for this wonder video.  Hope to see more of John Reese!  #PersonOfInterest
Love this!! What a perfect homage to Reese and his toys! The final photo is cool and funny.
AH, this is awesome. Jim is so fantastic with the BAMF. Nobody does ex-CIA agent better than Jim.
Brilliant. Love this. My favorite badass.
description:
John Reese's Big Gun Show
BGM: It's My Life by Bon Jovi.
Jim Caviezel is the best-looking man to play with big gun :)
Though the show may end, Man in Suit will forever exist in NYC.
